channel.title: Comments on: How Tennis Changed My Life
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Prince Malik
item.dc:creator: Prince Malik
item.description: Amazing story to read ! I am new to Tennis, in my 30's as a recreational player but love it so much.
item.content:encoded: Amazing story to read ! I am new to Tennis, in my 30’s as a recreational player but love it so much.

item.title: By: jon

item.description: wow, this is a great read. i enjoy tennis also. keep up the great work.
